law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Carrier's lien" means a lien established under § 7-307 of this article.
"Consumer" has the meaning stated in § 13-101 of this article.
"Household goods" means goods used primarily for personal, family, or household purposes.
"Household goods mover" means a person who provides household goods moving services.

section.section: "Household goods moving services" means the loading, packing, moving, transporting, storing while in transit, unloading, or otherwise taking possession or control from a consumer of household goods for the purpose of moving them to another location at the direction of the consumer for a fee.
"Household goods moving services" does not include moving household goods for disposal or destruction.
